objects.text:
• Elegant Faux Leather Design
• Gold Hardware Accents
• Spacious Interior Storage
• Perfect for Everyday Use

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner presents a stylish fashion advertisement centered around a tan tote bag image. The design is split into two vertical halves—left and right. The left side features a structured grid background pattern with a semi-transparent circle adding visual balance behind the heading. It contains multiple text layers including `heading`, `subheading`, and `tagline`, stacked vertically to convey product branding and category clearly. A `description` layer highlights standout features in bullet points. Below it, the prominently displayed `price` text grabs attention, followed by a `cta_background` rectangle beneath the "SHOP NOW" button text (`cta`). The right half presents the `product_image` with soft shadows and elegant grid lines behind it to ensure central focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Beige (#f9f8f6)
- Blush Tan (#d9c2aa)
- Clay Brown (#d1b495)
- Walnut Brown (#3a281e)
- Highlight Gold (#c49c7c)
- Light Taupe (#e6d5c5)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown shade (#B07E63), giving an elegant and minimalist appeal. The bag features subtle crosshatch textures that add depth without overwhelming the design. Accents of polished gold (#D4AF37) on the hardware—including the logo, chains, and decorative charms—enhance the luxurious feel, providing contrast and visual interest. The color blending is natural but deliberate, with the soft brown offering a matte base, letting the reflective gold pop without clashing. For an ad banner, a color palette of camel brown (#B07E63), gold (#D4AF37), off-white (#F5F5F5), and charcoal gray (#4B4B4B) would work beautifully.
